post.body: Good job twittering. No more secretive life : ) Ha. Just kidding. Come on Titans.
Next time. You missed some amazing gumbo. We have to get you bk over soon. We need you in our world big time.
I love it. You guys have a blast. You beat Memphis. No snow here yet.
Praying for Karyn. Pls tell her Leslie says hi and is praying and thinking about her all the time.
Trying to figure that out right now for 2009.
Good to know. Tks for the shout out and encouragement.
Thanks for the shout out. Merry Christmas to you too. I'm sure I will see you in 09.
Fired up for you guys. Believing for a great day for you tomorrow at Galen Center
As a freak, collosul ice storm forces us to cancel all of our services for two wks
Busy morning. All staff Chrismas party. Kids Christmas program at school. Back to office for more mttgs. Got to get a wk out in as well.
Great workout. Headed to office for mttgs all afternoon. Hope everyone is ready! Got to knock some things out today.
Doing my cardio - run, bike, stairmaster. Listening to a little Kajagoogoo. Come on, Too Shy. 80s flow. Helps the wk out. Memories.
Or maybe he just wants to stretch this one simple job out as long as possible.
Getting some wood cut at Lowes and I think this is the first time my man has done this.
Awesome services! Packed. Full of life and presence. 94 salvations for the wknd! Incredible. Now time for some Pei Wei then football all day
Sat serv good bump in attendance. Rough technically. But good salvations. In a dinner mttg welcoming 20 new couples as Service Pastors. Cool
Headed to Sat Night Service. I'm pumped about the night. Christmas flow, baby dedications, fresh starts. Oh yeah.
At old house cleaning up. Realtor showing it in morn. Been on market 6 mos. Need to sell asap. Pray for me twitter friends. 2 mortg a drag.
Slept late. Feeling a little rough. Coffee. How much do I love thee. Let me count the ways...
Welcome @danielmlord to Twitter. Been waiting for him to get on it. Bout time.
Sess 3 w/ pers trainer was intense. Not sure I will be able to lift my arms this wknd. Might have to preach w/ arms by my side. New style.
Ahhh. The sun.
Meeting with a pastor friend who is facing some big challenges. Feeling his pain, trying to bear his burden and not forget our early years.
I'm totally starving. I've got 900 calories left. Will def consume all of them tonight.
Awesome study time. Finishing touches on wknd mssg. Its a strategic wknd. Believing for massive salvations! Now hanging w/ a Pastor friend.
Just got beat down by personal trainer. Stomach went into full blown cramp. Ouch. But, alas, Steam Lord takes his place for post-war glory.
Typing from my new ipod touch. Xmas toy. Slick, but hard to type. Bberry tons bttr to type on. Still cool for video 32MG. and online.
Listening to Bocephus, Country Boy Can Survive. Thinking about my friend in Swazi, Greg Evans. Country boy from East TN in Africa.
http://twitpic.com/vxqx - IMG00077-20081224-1055.jpg Got the solution. Get pumped up for mall craziness
I can't believe I'm going to the mall on Christmas Eve and massive rain and wind.
So thankful for all my friends. Merry Christmas! I love you all.
OT. Pulling for Lafayette boy, Delhomme. Praying for @mattfry.
Humbled by another great wknd in church. I think we had 80 salvations. Over 4000 salvations in 2008. O mazing.
What an awesome Titans win! Come on, big Kev. Congrats. Praying for your arm.
Wow. Dallas folded.
Just started the Dallas v Baltimore game. Thankful for Tivo.
chris_bennett. Thks for the shout out my man. Appreciate your friendship. You guys have fun this wknd and a great Christmas to you.
Good Saturday. Slept late. Studied. Strong work out. Vacuumed. 2 hrs until Sat Night Service. Fired up. Got a word + some cool music tonight
Lovin' 70 degrees and sunny in Mtown. Got the sun roof open.
Headed to church office for last minute wrap ups before wknd.
